flawed_nl_solution:
The profit Ronald wants is $3000 / 3 = $<<3000/3=1000.0>>1000.0
The profit per phone sold will be $1000.0 / 200 phones = $<<1000.0/200=5.0>>5.0/phone
The cost of each phone is $3000 / 200 phones = $<<3000/200=51.0>>51.0/phone
The selling price including the profit will be $51.0/phone + $5.0/phone = $<<51.0+5.0=56.0>>56.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15.0, not 51.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
